: : Sting : :

Sting:  I'm right on it!

After saying that, Sting heads ove=
r to a control panel with a few screens.  After examining it for a minute, =
he presses some buttons.  He brings up a vision of Earth onto the screen, a=
nd has the option to do various types of scans.  He does a full scan of the=
 planet, and data appears.

Sting:  According to this scan, Earth is quite =
inhabited.  There are many transformers, part of the Neo Beast Wars.  Apart=
 from them, there are simple organic lifeforms scattered all over the plane=
t.  There appears to be two main continents, and then there's a smaller one=
 and some island-like landscapes.

He runs another separate scan.

Sting:  =
Apparently, it looks like we don't have any risks on the way.  There is a l=
ot of distance between our destination and other factions.  I suggest we ma=
ke full speed towards the base.
